messages.title: YOU CAN CHANGE THE COUNTRY
messages.content: On 8th June you decide the future direction of Britain. Your choice could not be clearer or more important.

messages.title: A STRONG OPPOSITION WITH THE LIB DEMS
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats are fighting for what’s most important for families across Britain - NHS services and schools. The Lib Dems are tipped to win dozens of seats against the Conservatives and people look to secure a strong opposition that will change the direction of the country.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The Liberal Democrats are tipped to win dozens of seats against the Conservatives and people look to secure a strong opposition that will change the direction of the country.

quotes.text: Widowed parents are being hit again by Tory cuts to bereavement benefits.
There is no realistic chance of us winning.
Labour fear election bloodbath as a QUARTER of MPs face losing their seats
